• Identified and implemented process improvement opportunities in cashiering operations.•  Provided expertise and acted as a trusted advisor to enterprise architecture and governance in the selection of an enterprise-wide business process management solution.• Managed budget and dependencies with client services teams for successful transition to the new system.

• Implemented Schwab’s first automated document system that eliminated manual tracking and reduced risk exposure for fraud and monetary losses.• Developed requirement specifications for account open and cashiering workflows.• Enabled monitoring capabilities for key performance indicators (KPIs).
